item.title:
#TheLittleMermaid is currently being review-bombed on film ratings websites around the world, leading sites to issue warnings of unusual activity.
: https://deadline.com/2023/05/the-little-mermaid-global-opening-review-bombing-international-box-office-1235381992/…
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Zara Larsson performs her new single “End of Time” live at BBC #BigWeekend.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Melissa McCarthy's makeup artist Peter Swords King says he did not draw inspiration from the original animated film for his version of Ursula:
“No, no. It was me. I didn't really draw on anything. I played around quite a lot with different colors, different shapes, and stuff,”
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Melissa McCarthy’s makeup artist for #TheLittleMermaid responds to “offensive” comments saying that a queer makeup artist should have been hired to bring Ursula to life:
“Why can't I do as good a job as a queer makeup artist? That's ridiculous.“
: https://insider.com/ursula-little-mermaid-mua-responds-to-criticism-disney-queer-artist-2023-5…

item.title: #TheLittleMermaid is currently the #1 movie in the world.
